Beautician & Advanced Aesthetics Practitioner in Nottingham
It\'s SUMMER and it\'s all about you…there\'s never a better time to treat yourself to a gorgeous new style
"Here at Xpression Hair, Beauty & Aesthetic’s we have built up an excellent reputation in our local area by offering the most comprehensive and expert Hair & Beauty service in Nottingham."

Established in 2021, Xpression Hair & Beauty is one of the best Aesthetics spa in Nottingham, United Kingdom. We are proud to deliver a high standard of beauty services, including nails, eyelashes, waxing, and pedicure.
Our mission is to provide the residents of Nottingham with a no hassle Hair & Beauty service where all work exceeds expectations, meets deadlines & offer excellent value.

5 star treatments always from Xpression Hair & Beauty. They are honest about the treatments and the benefits and takes time to explain the science behind them. I have had several facial treatments and nails where the nails stayed on for weeks !!
Great experience with Xpression Hair & Beauty, very accommodating, helpful as well as professional, been going here for years and wouldn\'t change, id highly recommend you try for yourself.

Professional service on every visit, have nails and hair done at the salon and always receive so many compliments about both. Xpression Hair & Beauty is friendly and makes everyone comfortable, I wouldn\'t go anywhere else for treatments and recommend to everyone.
If you’re looking for Hair & Beauty work in and around Nottingham then please do not hesitate to contact us. We pride ourselves on our great level of service and high standard of workmanship.
Ladies Cut and Finish From a trim that refreshes your look to a daring restyle, you’re in great hands with our expert stylists. Beautiful hair awaits at the end of this wash, cut and style
Get that salon-fresh style whether you’re going out or it’s just time to treat yourself.
Looking your best is easy with our expert stylists. Whether you prefer a fade, short back and sides, or scissors over comb you’re in safe hands with this wash, cut and style.
For a subtle, natural look, a glossing will blend greys or add depth and shine to your natural colour. It slowly fades over time making it a low-maintenance refresh for your hair.
When regrowth starts to show after a full head of permanent colour, refresh your roots for beautiful, seamless colour. Upgrade to Inoa colour for just £10.
Lighter or darker this full head of colour can enhance your own natural beauty, cover greys, or make a dramatic impact. Upgrade to Inoa colour for just £10.

Balayage is a natural looking, low maintenance way to add lighter shades to your hair. Colour is swept through the mid-length and ends giving an organic look and feel. For those who want to darken their roots, you will need to add Regrowth Permanent Colour to this service.
Give your hair gorgeous multi-tonal depth with root to tip colour. In most cases a toner will be necessary to achieve your desired shade and add gloss and shine.

Beautifully disguise your roots between full or half-head visits with highlights placed along your parting and front hairline. In most cases a toner will be necessary to achieve your desired shade and add gloss and shine.
Prices are subject to confirmation during consultation. Any surcharge fees will be discussed during your appointment and may result in a £10-£30 charge being added to your service bill.
Hair color is the easiest way to change your appearance, but a bad dye job might draw more attention to you.
Estheticians like us are like personal trainers for your skin.
When your nails are part of your outfit, they become more than nails. They become an accessory.
Our barbers are the artist whose drawing on our customers\' heads become the trend and fashion.
Sometimes you grow a beard and find it attractive. Sometimes you find it funny.
“A good weekend starts with a positive attitude and a great massage.”
